name: Amulet of Magic <drizzling>
data: It increases the users wisdom pitifully.
It increases the users intelligence pitifully.
It has poor armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
increases the users hitpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
